name: THE ULTIMATE EMPIRE
description:
THE ULTIMATE EMPIRE *only the first chapter for now   Story 

The Five Cursed Weapons suddenly disappeared from the clan, so you decided to go out alone to look for them since you are the future ruler, in order to prove your willingness to rule and dominate.

- As of now, only keyboard and mouse are recommended as controller and gamepad controls are still being worked out and may cause issues.

Controls:

W/A/S/D: Movement 

Q: Dash

Spacebar: Jump

Tab : Lock-on 

Left Mouse Button: Fire Weapon, Interact with Menus 

Right Mouse Button: Defense 

F : Interact 

I : Inventory 

H : Add health

Left Shift: Sprint 

Install instructions

Extract all files into 1 folder and then open THE ULTIMATE EMPIRE  Demo.exe

Requirements: 

Windows:

OS: Windows 7 or later

Processor: 1.7GHz Dual Core (2th generation i3 or equivalent) or better

Memory: 2 GB RAM

Graphics: 512MB DirectX 9.0 compatible graphics card (shader model 2) or better

Storage: 2 GB available space

Join  our Discord : https://discord.gg/mXmPRBTq

Thanks

(If the game has any BUG, please report it to us.)

Discord, Facebook Page . YouTube channel
